attributes.action: Remove the royal titles from the Duchess and Duke of Sussex.
attributes.additional_details: Her Majesty's government is there to debate and to represent the will of the people and it is the will of the people that calls for the removal of the titles of Duke and Duchess of Sussex.
attributes.background: To communicate the frustration and anger of her Majesty's subjects to her Majesty the Queen and remove the titles of Duke and Duchess from the current Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, including asking for people to be given or have titles removed. In any case, the use of Royal titles are a matter for Her Majesty the Queen and not the Government or Parliament.
